Grouped_Utterances: It’s been exciting but also a bit overwhelming. There’s so much going on all the time. I’ve been trying to stick to a routine and make time for self-care.

Hi, Ellie! Things have been pretty good. I’ve been busy with auditions and adjusting to life in New York. I’ve been making an effort to go out and socialize. I even made a couple of friends from my yoga class. It’s been great! I feel like I’m starting to establish a support system.

I’ve been doing yoga regularly and taking time to explore the city. It helps me feel grounded. Yeah, I love Central Park! It’s a nice escape from the hustle and bustle. It calms my nerves and helps me focus on the performance rather than the pressure. I think I was just in a good headspace, and I was able to connect with the material.
They’ve been going well! I feel more confident walking into the room. Yes! I had an audition for a theater production, and I felt really good about it.
I’ve been trying to incorporate more relaxation techniques before going in, like deep breathing.

I want to keep practicing my techniques and maybe take some acting classes to improve my skills. I found a few options online, but I haven’t committed to anything yet. That sounds like a plan! I’ll look into it. I think I’m good for now. I just want to keep building on everything we’ve talked about.
